akn:section.akn:heading: Demonstration of official standards; samples; cost

akn:content.akn:p: § 511c. Demonstration of official standards; samples; cost The Secretary is authorized to demonstrate the official standards; to prepare and distribute, upon request, samples, illustrations, or sets thereof; and to make reasonable charges therefore: Provided, That in no event shall charges be in excess of the cost of said samples, illustrations, and services so rendered. (Aug. 23, 1935, ch. 623, § 4, 49 Stat. 732.)
